languages.text: {n}Пожав плечами, Джай по-старому улыбается вам.{/n} "Твое слово — закон, шерин. И для меня, и для этой жирной пронырливой мокрицы".
{n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."
languages.original_text: {n}Пожав плечами, Джай по-старому улыбается вам.{/n} "Твое слово — закон, шерин. И для меня, и для этой жирной пронырливой мокрицы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩，对你露出了你早已习惯的迷人笑容。{/n}“你的话就是法律，亲爱的。对这只臃肿、狡猾的虱子而言，也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩，对你露出了你早已习惯的迷人笑容。{/n}“你的话就是法律，亲爱的。对这只臃肿、狡猾的虱子而言，也同样如此。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}肩をすくめて、ジェイは以前のような、まばゆいばかりの笑顔を見せる。{/n}「あんたの言葉が法だよ、シャリーン。あたしにとっても、この慢心した、ずる賢い虫けらにとってもね」
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}肩をすくめて、ジェイは以前のような、まばゆいばかりの笑顔を見せる。{/n}「あんたの言葉が法だよ、シャリーン。あたしにとっても、この慢心した、ずる賢い虫けらにとってもね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros y te lanza una sonrisa deslumbrante.{/n} «Su palabra es ley, shereen. Para mí y para este piojo abotargado y artero».
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros y te lanza una sonrisa deslumbrante.{/n} «Su palabra es ley, shereen. Para mí y para este piojo abotargado y artero».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un haussement d'épaules, Jae vous lance l'un de ses fameux sourires éblouissants.{/n} « Vos paroles font loi, shereen. Pour moi, autant que pour cette raclure hypocrite. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un haussement d'épaules, Jae vous lance l'un de ses fameux sourires éblouissants.{/n} « Vos paroles font loi, shereen. Pour moi, autant que pour cette raclure hypocrite. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit den Schultern zuckend schenkt dir Jae ihr altes strahlendes Lächeln.{/n} "Euer Wort ist Gesetz, Shereen. Für mich und für diese aufgeblasene, hinterhältige Laus."
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit den Schultern zuckend schenkt dir Jae ihr altes strahlendes Lächeln.{/n} "Euer Wort ist Gesetz, Shereen. Für mich und für diese aufgeblasene, hinterhältige Laus."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Omuz silken Jae, o alışık olduğun pırıl pırıl gülümsemesini sergiliyor.{/n} "Sözlerin benim için kanundur şirinim. Hem benim hem de bu kendini beğenmiş, alçak sülük parçası için."
languages.original_text: {n}Shrugging, Jae gives you one of her dazzling smiles of old.{/n} "Your word is law, shereen. For me, and for this bloated, devious louse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae omuz silkiyor ve sana o alışık olduğun pırıl pırıl gülümsemesini gösteriyor.{/n} "Sözlerin benim için kanundur şirinim. Benim için de, bu kendini beğenmiş, alçak sülük parçası için de."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
